description: Once we hit this goal, I’ll be able to work on Ucupaint full-time! So you’ll get new features way faster!
title: $5,000 per month
fullDescription:
### Fellow 3D artists! 👋

Since 2017 I've been working on Ucupaint, a free and open source Blender addon that can help you a lot with the material creation. As for September 2025, Ucupaint has been downloaded almost 200k across the [Blender Extension Platform](https://extensions.blender.org/add-ons/ucupaint/) and [GitHub](https://github.com/ucupumar/ucupaint/releases), and the number is still accelerating!

### Why sponsoring me? 🙋

Sponsoring Ucupaint can help make the development sustainable. There are a lot of ideas and feature requests left to do, but the implementation takes time since I also have other responsibilities. If this funding goes well, I can put much more time into development and doing the documentation/tutorials.
